mc.name: Yavimaya Wurm
mc.oracleText: Trample
mc.printedText: Trample
mc.flavorText: When the gorilla playfully grabbed the wurm's tail, the wurm doubled back and playfully ate the gorilla's head.

mc.name: Wing Snare
mc.oracleText: Destroy target creature with flying.
mc.printedText: Destroy target creature with flying.
mc.flavorText:
"Argoth's doom rained from a clear sky. Yavimaya will not share that fate."
--Multani, maro-sorcerer

mc.name: Granite Grip
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each Mountain you control.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each mountain you control.
mc.flavorText: There's beauty in the desert--but it's best to view it from afar.

mc.name: Rank and File
mc.oracleText: When Rank and File comes into play, all green creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: When Rank and File comes into play, all green creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "Left, right, left, right . . . hmm. Okay--left, left, left, left, . . ."

mc.name: Mother of Runes
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from a color of your choice until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "My family protects all families."

mc.name: Knighthood
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control have first strike.
mc.printedText: All creatures you control gain first strike.
mc.flavorText:
"He has returned. He who brought the dark ones. He who poisoned our paradise. How shall we greet him? With swift and certain death"
--Radiant, archangel

mc.name: Ostracize
mc.oracleText: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. Choose a creature card from it. That player discards that card.
mc.printedText: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a creature card there. That player discards that card.
mc.flavorText: Kerrick was to find that some borders can never be crossed.

mc.name: Opal Avenger
mc.oracleText: When you have 10 life or less, if Opal Avenger is an enchantment, Opal Avenger becomes a 3/5 Soldier creature.
mc.printedText: When you have 10 life or less, if Opal Avenger is an enchantment, Opal Avenger becomes a 3/5 creature that counts as a Guardian.
mc.flavorText: As the sun grew cold in the realm, the statue grew warm.

mc.name: Might of Oaks
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Suddenly, she couldn't see the acorns for the trees.

mc.name: Scrapheap
mc.oracleText: Whenever an artifact or enchantment is put into your graveyard from play, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever an artifact or enchantment is put into your graveyard from play, gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: Junk heaps have rats, but scrapheaps have goblins.

mc.name: Quicksilver Amulet
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand into play.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: Choose a creature card in your hand and put that creature into play.
mc.flavorText: "Wonderful You got a lion on your first try. Now put it back."

mc.name: Angel's Trumpet
mc.oracleText:
All creatures have vigilance.
At the end of each player's turn, tap all untapped creatures that player controls that didn't attack this turn. Angel's Trumpet deals damage to the player equal to the number of creatures tapped this way.
mc.printedText:
Attacking does not cause creatures to tap.
At the end of each player's turn, tap all untapped creatures he or she controls that did not attack this turn. Angel's Trumpet deals 1 damage to that player for each creature tapped this way.

mc.name: Memory Jar
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Memory Jar: Each player removes his or her hand from the game face down and draws seven cards. At end of turn, each player discards his or her hand and returns to his or her hand each card he or she removed from the game this way.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Memory Jar: Each player sets aside his or her hand, face down, and draws seven cards. At end of turn, each player discards his or her hand and returns to his or her hand each card he or she set aside this way.

mc.name: Thran Lens
mc.oracleText: All permanents are colorless.
mc.printedText: All permanents are colorless.
mc.flavorText:
"Every device in the rig is evidence of Thran enlightenment. All mana was the same to them, whether from rock or water, growth or decay. Can you imagine such unity of vision?"
--Urza, journal

mc.name: Jhoira's Toolbox
mc.oracleText: {2}: Regenerate target artifact creature.
mc.printedText: {2}: Regenerate target artifact creature.
mc.flavorText: It entertained Jhoira to craft a kit that could bring her the tools.

mc.name: Defense Grid
mc.oracleText: Each spell costs {3} more to play except during its controller's turn.
mc.printedText: During each player's turn, spells played by another player cost an additional {3}.
mc.flavorText:
"We've managed to keep the goblins in their assigned areas, but there's little we can do about the smell."
--Whip Tongue, viashino technician

mc.name: Rivalry
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player controls more lands than any other, Rivalry deals 2 damage to him or her.
mc.printedText: During each player's upkeep, if that player controls more lands than any other, Rivalry deals 2 damage to him or her.
mc.flavorText: The goblins revered it; the viashino defended it. Only Urza understood it.

mc.name: Molten Hydra
mc.oracleText:
{1}{R}{R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Molten Hydra.
{T}, Remove all +1/+1 counters from Molten Hydra: Molten Hydra deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of counters removed this way.
mc.printedText:
{1}{R}{R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Molten Hydra.
{T}, Remove all +1/+1 counters from Molten Hydra: Molten Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature or player for each +1/+1 counter removed this way.
mc.flavorText: Keep off the glass.Hydra warning sign

mc.name: Sick and Tired
mc.oracleText: Two target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Two target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The Phyrexians' only interest in organic life is discerning its weakness.

mc.name: Swat
mc.oracleText:
Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

mc.name: Fog of Gnats
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{B}: Regenerate Fog of Gnats.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{B}: Regenerate Fog of Gnats.
mc.flavorText: You can swat a thousand gnats, but a thousand more will assail you.

mc.name: Iron Maiden
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Iron Maiden deals 1 damage to that player for each card more than four in his or her hand.
mc.printedText: During each of your opponent's upkeeps, Iron Maiden deals 1 damage to that player for each card more than four in his or her hand.
mc.flavorText: The maiden is a jealous lover.

mc.name: Wheel of Torture
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Wheel of Torture deals 1 damage to that player for each card fewer than three in his or her hand.
mc.printedText: During each of your opponents' upkeeps, Wheel of Torture deals 1 damage to that player for each card fewer than three in his or her hand.
mc.flavorText: "I'd like to buy a bowel."

mc.name: Peace and Quiet
mc.oracleText: Destroy two target enchantments.
mc.printedText: Destroy two target enchantments.
mc.flavorText:
"In time our realm will shine again. But it will gleam only when we scour away the taint of doubt."
--Radiant, archangel

mc.name: Martyr's Cause
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a creature: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature: Prevent all damage to a creature or player from one source. (Treat further damage from that source normally.)
mc.flavorText: Dying is a soldier's talent.

mc.name: Treefolk Mystic
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature blocks or becomes blocked by Treefolk Mystic, destroy all Auras attached to that creature.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature blocks or is blocked by Treefolk Mystic, destroy all enchantments on that creature.
mc.flavorText: Urza's wards fell from him like autumn leaves as he entered the dreaming grove. He awoke imprisoned in living wood.

mc.name: Tethered Skirge
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Tethered Skirge becomes the target of a spell or ability, you lose 1 life.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Tethered Skirge becomes the target of a spell or ability, lose 1 life.
mc.flavorText: It bites the hand that leads it.

mc.name: Cloud of Faeries
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Cloud of Faeries comes into play, untap up to two lands.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Cloud of Faeries comes into play, untap up to two lands.
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

mc.name: Delusions of Mediocrity
mc.oracleText:
When Delusions of Mediocrity comes into play, you gain 10 life.

When Delusions of Mediocrity leaves play, you lose 10 life.
mc.printedText:
When Delusions of Mediocrity comes into play, gain 10 life.
When Delusions of Mediocrity leaves play, lose 10 life.
mc.flavorText: When nothing but second best will do.

mc.name: Opal Champion
mc.oracleText: When an opponent plays a creature spell, if Opal Champion is an enchantment, Opal Champion becomes a 3/3 Knight creature with first strike.
mc.printedText: When one of your opponents successfully casts a creature spell, if Opal Champion is an enchantment, Opal Champion becomes a 3/3 creature with first strike that counts as a Knight.

mc.name: Defender of Law
mc.oracleText:
Flash
Protection from red
mc.printedText:
Protection from red
You may play Defender of Law any time you could play an instant.
mc.flavorText: "It is not my place to question Radiant's rule. I exist to enforce her will."

mc.name: Angelic Curator
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from artifacts
mc.printedText: Flying, protection from artifacts
mc.flavorText:
"Do not treat your people as you treat your artifacts. Let them go, and they will live; seal them here, and they will die."
--Urza, to Radiant

mc.name: Tragic Poet
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Tragic Poet: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Tragic Poet: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: "I would weep, but my tears have been stolen; I would shout, but my voice has been taken. Thus, I write."

mc.name: Expendable Troops
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Expendable Troops: Expendable Troops deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Expendable Troops: Expendable Troops deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.flavorText: No doubt in their minds, no fear in their hearts.

mc.name: Iron Will
mc.oracleText:
Target creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Target creature gets +0/+4 until end of turn.
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

mc.name: Cessation
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
When Cessation is put into a graveyard from play, return Cessation to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature cannot attack.
When Cessation is put into a graveyard from play, return Cessation to owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"The face of Light will shine upon them, and they will know war no more."
--Song of All, canto 918

mc.name: Radiant's Judgment
mc.oracleText:
Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

mc.name: Radiant's Dragoons
mc.oracleText:
Echo {3}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Radiant's Dragoons comes into play, you gain 5 life.
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
When Radiant's Dragoons comes into play, gain 5 life.

mc.name: Planar Collapse
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more creatures in play, sacrifice Planar Collapse. If you do, destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, if there are four or more creatures in play, sacrifice Planar Collapse and destroy all creatures. Those creatures cannot be regenerated this turn.
mc.flavorText: With heavy heart, Urza doused one world's light to rekindle another's.

mc.name: Blessed Reversal
mc.oracleText: You gain 3 life for each creature attacking you.
mc.printedText: Gain 3 life for each creature attacking you.
mc.flavorText: Even an enemy is a valuable resource.

mc.name: Purify
mc.oracleText: Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
mc.printedText: Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
mc.flavorText:
"Our Mother The sky was Her hair; the sun, Her face. She danced on the grass and in the hills."
--Song of All, canto 23

mc.name: Radiant, Archangel
mc.oracleText:
Flying, vigilance
Radiant, Archangel gets +1/+1 for each other creature with flying in play.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Radiant, Archangel counts as an Angel.
Attacking does not cause Radiant to tap.
Radiant gets +1/+1 for each other creature with flying in play.

mc.name: Thornwind Faeries
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{T}: Thornwind Faeries deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}: Thornwind Faeries deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Guarding the ship is the Thornwinds' first concern. Getting along with the locals ranks fourth or fifth at best.

mc.name: Weatherseed Faeries
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from red
mc.printedText: Flying, protection from red
mc.flavorText: Two days after the forge was completed, the faeries were immune to its flames.

mc.name: Vigilant Drake
mc.oracleText:
Flying

{2}{U}: Untap Vigilant Drake.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{2}{U}: Untap Vigilant Drake.
mc.flavorText: Awake and awing in the blink of an eye.

mc.name: Bouncing Beebles
mc.oracleText: Bouncing Beebles is unblockable as long as defending player controls an artifact.
mc.printedText: Bouncing Beebles is unblockable if defending player controls an artifact.
mc.flavorText: Beebles are frequently hurled against stone surfaces at high speed but always zing back into the air with a giggle.

mc.name: Snap
mc.oracleText: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Untap up to two lands.
mc.printedText: Return target creature to owner's hand. Untap up to two lands.
mc.flavorText: Good riddance.

mc.name: Frantic Search
mc.oracleText:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Untap up to three lands.
mc.printedText: Draw two cards, then choose and discard two cards. Untap up to three lands.
mc.flavorText: Motivation was high in the academy once students realized flunking their exams could kill them.

mc.name: Miscalculation
mc.oracleText:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Counter target spell unless its caster pays an additional {2}.
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

mc.name: Intervene
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell that targets a creature.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell that targets a creature.
mc.flavorText:
"At first I simply observed. But I found that without investment in others, life serves no purpose."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Walking Sponge
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature loses flying, first strike, or trample until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature loses flying, first strike, or trample until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Not only does it catch fish, it cleans them too.

mc.name: Raven Familiar
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Echo {2}{U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Raven Familiar comes into play, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
mc.printedText:
Flying; echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
When Raven Familiar comes into play, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

mc.name: King Crab
mc.oracleText: {1}{U}, {T}: Put target green creature on top of its owner's library.
mc.printedText: {1}{U}, {T}: Put target green creature on top of owner's library.
mc.flavorText:
"I'm allergic to shellfish--not only did it kill my entire village, it also gave me this nasty rash."
--Olivia, fisher

mc.name: Tinker
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Tinker, sacrifice an artifact.

Search your library for an artifact card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
At the time you play Tinker, sacrifice an artifact.
Search your library for an artifact card and put that artifact into play. Shuffle your library afterward.
mc.flavorText:
"I wonder how it feels to be bored."
--Jhoira, artificer

mc.name: Slow Motion
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player sacrifices that creature unless he or she pays {2}.
When Slow Motion is put into a graveyard from play, return Slow Motion to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
During the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player pays {2} or sacrifices that creature.
When Slow Motion is put into a graveyard from play, return Slow Motion to owner's hand.

mc.name: Rebuild
mc.oracleText:
Return all artifacts to their owners' hands.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Return all artifacts to owners' hands.
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

mc.name: Lurking Skirge
mc.oracleText: When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from play, if Lurking Skirge is an enchantment, Lurking Skirge becomes a 3/2 Imp creature with flying.
mc.printedText: When a creature is put into one of your opponents' graveyards, if Lurking Skirge is an enchantment, Lurking Skirge becomes a 3/2 creature with flying that counts as an Imp.
mc.flavorText: They never miss a funeral.

mc.name: Anthroplasm
mc.oracleText:
Anthroplasm comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{X}, {T}: Remove all +1/+1 counters from Anthroplasm and put X +1/+1 counters on it.
mc.printedText:
Anthroplasm comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{X}, {T}: Remove all +1/+1 counters from Anthroplasm and put X +1/+1 counters on it.
mc.flavorText: I never metamorphosis I didn't like.

mc.name: Levitation
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control have flying. (They can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: All creatures you control gain flying.
mc.flavorText: Barrin's pride in his apprentice was diminished somewhat when he had to get the others back down.

mc.name: Fleeting Image
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
{1}{U}: Return Fleeting Image to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{1}{U}: Return Fleeting Image to owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: Horas swore off drinking, but after meeting the creature a second time he decided he'd better start again.

mc.name: Archivist
mc.oracleText: {T}: Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {T}: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Some do. Some teach. The rest look it up.

mc.name: Second Chance
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 5 life or less, sacrifice Second Chance. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, if you have 5 life or less, sacrifice Second Chance and take an extra turn after this one.
mc.flavorText: The greatest gift is the opportunity to right one's wrongs.

mc.name: Phyrexian Broodlings
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phyrexian Broodlings.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phyrexian Broodlings.
mc.flavorText: With limited resources and near unlimited time, Kerrick used parts from one beast to build another.

mc.name: Plague Beetle
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
mc.printedText: Swampwalk (If defending player controls a swamp, this creature is unblockable.)
mc.flavorText: It is the harbinger of disease, not the carrier.

mc.name: Sleeper's Guile
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has fear.
When Sleeper's Guile is put into a graveyard from play, return Sleeper's Guile to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature cannot be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.
When Sleeper's Guile is put into a graveyard from play, return Sleeper's Guile to owner's hand.

mc.name: Unearth
mc.oracleText:
Return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to play.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Choose target creature card in your graveyard with total casting cost 3 or less and put that creature into play.
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

mc.name: Bone Shredder
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Echo {2}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Bone Shredder comes into play, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
mc.printedText: Flying; echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.) When Bone Shredder comes into play, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.

mc.name: Treacherous Link
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
All damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature is dealt to its controller instead.
mc.printedText: Redirect to its controller all damage dealt to enchanted creature.
mc.flavorText:
"You cannot possibly know the toll your alliances will exact from you."
--Barrin, to Urza

mc.name: Eviscerator
mc.oracleText:
Protection from white
When Eviscerator comes into play, you lose 5 life.
mc.printedText:
Protection from white
When Eviscerator comes into play, lose 5 life.
mc.flavorText: It roamed the time bubble like a captured animal. Kerrick knew he must soon find a way to unleash it on Tolaria or destroy it.

mc.name: Brink of Madness
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have no cards in hand, sacrifice Brink of Madness. If you do, target opponent discards his or her hand.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, if you have no cards in hand, sacrifice Brink of Madness and target opponent discards his or her hand.
mc.flavorText:
"The fools thought me dead. But I built an empire inside my tomb."
--Kerrick, sleeper agent

mc.name: Subversion
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, each of your opponents loses 1 life. Gain 1 life for each 1 life lost this way.
mc.flavorText: Kerrick's corrupt domain swelled like a blister on Tolaria's skin.

mc.name: No Mercy
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature successfully deals damage to you, destroy it.
mc.flavorText:
"We had years to prepare, while they had mere minutes."
--Kerrick, sleeper agent

mc.name: Viashino Sandscout
mc.oracleText:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At end of turn, return Viashino Sandscout to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's in play.)
mc.printedText:
Viashino Sandscout is unaffected by summoning sickness.
At end of turn, return Viashino Sandscout to owner's hand.

mc.name: Defender of Chaos
mc.oracleText:
Flash
Protection from white
mc.printedText:
Protection from white
You may play Defender of Chaos any time you could play an instant.
mc.flavorText: Some knights will not follow orders--only disorder.

mc.name: Pygmy Pyrosaur
mc.oracleText:
Pygmy Pyrosaur can't block.

{R}: Pygmy Pyrosaur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Pygmy Pyrosaur cannot block.
{R}: Pygmy Pyrosaur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
Do not judge a lizard by its size.
--Ghitu proverb

mc.name: About Face
mc.oracleText: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Effects that alter the creature's power alter its toughness instead, and vice versa, this turn.
mc.flavorText: The overconfident are the most vulnerable.

mc.name: Parch
mc.oracleText: Choose one - Parch deals 2 damage to target creature or player; or Parch deals 4 damage to target blue creature.
mc.printedText: Choose one Parch deals 2 damage to target creature or player; or Parch deals 4 damage to target blue creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Your porous flesh betrays you."
--Fire Eye, viashino bey

mc.name: Sluggishness
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't block.
When Sluggishness is put into a graveyard from play, return Sluggishness to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature cannot block.
When Sluggishness is put into a graveyard from play, return Sluggishness to owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: Vark decided to lie down and think of a good excuse to quit working.

mc.name: Avalanche Riders
mc.oracleText:
Haste
Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Avalanche Riders comes into play, destroy target land.
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
Avalanche Riders is unaffected by summoning sickness.
When Avalanche Riders comes into play, destroy target land.

mc.name: Viashino Cutthroat
mc.oracleText:
Haste

At end of turn, return Viashino Cutthroat to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Viashino Cutthroat is unaffected by summoning sickness.
At end of turn, return Viashino Cutthroat to owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"You guys go on ahead. I'll catch up with ya."
--Vark, goblin scout, last words

mc.name: Rack and Ruin
mc.oracleText: Destroy two target artifacts.
mc.printedText: Destroy two target artifacts.
mc.flavorText:
"My people are bound by masters centuries dead. Each artifact we destroy is another link broken in that chain."
--Barb Tail, viashino heretic

mc.name: Shivan Phoenix
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Shivan Phoenix is put into a graveyard from play, return Shivan Phoenix to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Shivan Phoenix is put into a graveyard from play, return Shivan Phoenix to owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: To strike down the phoenix is to slash at the flame.

mc.name: Viashino Heretic
mc.oracleText: {1}{R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact. Viashino Heretic deals damage to that artifact's controller equal to the artifact's converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: {1}{R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact. Viashino Heretic deals to that artifact's controller damage equal to the artifact's total casting cost.
mc.flavorText: "The past is buried for good reason."

mc.name: Impending Disaster
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are seven or more lands in play, sacrifice Impending Disaster. If you do, destroy all lands.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, if there are seven or more lands in play, sacrifice Impending Disaster and destroy all lands.
mc.flavorText:
"The goblins are in charge of maintenance? Why not just set it on fire now and call it a day?"
--Whip Tongue, viashino technician

mc.name: Multani's Acolyte
mc.oracleText:
Echo {G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Multani's Acolyte comes into play, draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
When Multani's Acolyte comes into play, draw a card.

mc.name: Simian Grunts
mc.oracleText:
Flash
Echo {2}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
You may play Simian Grunts any time you could play an instant.
mc.flavorText: These monkeys mean business.

mc.name: Yavimaya Scion
mc.oracleText: Protection from artifacts
mc.printedText: Protection from artifacts
mc.flavorText: Each time the saw blade bit, the tree spat it out.

mc.name: Weatherseed Elf
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn. (If defending player controls a forest, this creature is unblockable.)
mc.flavorText: "My grandmother once told me the future of our world was inside the Weatherseed. When I touched it, I knew she was right."

mc.name: Crop Rotation
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Crop Rotation, sacrifice a land.

Search your library for a land card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
At the time you play Crop Rotation, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for a land card and put that land into play. Shuffle your library afterward.
mc.flavorText: "Hmm . . . maybe lotuses this year."

mc.name: Rancor
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
When Rancor is put into a graveyard from play, return Rancor to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gains +2/+0 and trample.
When Rancor is put into a graveyard from play, return Rancor to owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: Hatred outlives the hateful.

mc.name: Darkwatch Elves
mc.oracleText:
Protection from black
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Protection from black
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

mc.name: Lone Wolf
mc.oracleText: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
mc.printedText: You may have Lone Wolf deal combat damage to defending player instead of to creatures blocking it.
mc.flavorText: A wolf without a pack is either a survivor or a brute.

mc.name: Harmonic Convergence
mc.oracleText: Return all enchantments to top of their owners' libraries.
mc.printedText: Return all enchantments to top of owners' libraries.
mc.flavorText: When the eternal stars align, can mere mortals resist?

mc.name: Weatherseed Treefolk
mc.oracleText:
Trample
When Weatherseed Treefolk is put into a graveyard from play, return Weatherseed Treefolk to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Trample
When Weatherseed Treefolk is put into a graveyard from play, return Weatherseed Treefolk to owner's hand.

mc.name: Multani, Maro-Sorcerer
mc.oracleText:
Shroud (This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Multani's power and toughness are each equal to the total number of cards in all players' hands.
mc.printedText:
Multani, Maro-Sorcerer has power and toughness each equal to the total number of cards in all players' hands.
Multani cannot be the target of spells or abilities.
mc.flavorText:
"To make peace with the forest, make peace with me."
--Multani, to Urza

mc.name: Hidden Gibbons
mc.oracleText: When an opponent plays an instant spell, if Hidden Gibbons is an enchantment, Hidden Gibbons becomes a 4/4 Ape creature.
mc.printedText: When one of your opponents successfully casts an instant or interrupt spell, if Hidden Gibbons is an enchantment, Hidden Gibbons becomes a 4/4 creature that counts as an Ape.
mc.flavorText: When these apes want something, it's a matter of gibbon take.

mc.name: Defense of the Heart
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart. If you do, search your library for up to two creature cards and put those creatures into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, if one of your opponents controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, and put those creatures into play. Shuffle your library afterward.

mc.name: Deranged Hermit
mc.oracleText:
Echo {3}{G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Deranged Hermit comes into play, put four 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens into play.
Squirrel creatures get +1/+1.
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
When Deranged Hermit comes into play, put four Squirrel tokens into play. Treat these tokens as 1/1 green creatures.
All Squirrels get +1/+1.

mc.name: Bloated Toad
mc.oracleText:
Protection from blue
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Protection from blue
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

mc.name: Ghitu Slinger
mc.oracleText:
Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Ghitu Slinger comes into play, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
When Ghitu Slinger comes into play, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: If you survive a slinger attack, the slinger wished you to live.

mc.name: Multani's Presence
mc.oracleText: Whenever a spell you played is countered, draw a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever a spell you play is countered, draw a card.
mc.flavorText: When a tree falls in the forest, Multani hears it.

mc.name: Forbidding Watchtower
mc.oracleText:
Forbidding Watchtower comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{1}{W}: Forbidding Watchtower becomes a 1/5 white Soldier creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
mc.printedText:
Forbidding Watchtower comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add one white mana to your mana pool.
{1}{W}: Forbidding Watchtower becomes a 1/5 white creature until end of turn. This creature still counts as a land.

mc.name: Faerie Conclave
mc.oracleText:
Faerie Conclave comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{1}{U}: Faerie Conclave becomes a 2/1 blue Faerie creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText:
Faerie Conclave comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add one blue mana to your mana pool.
{1}{U}: Faerie Conclave becomes a 2/1 blue creature with flying until end of turn. This creature still counts as a land.

mc.name: Spawning Pool
mc.oracleText:
Spawning Pool comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{1}{B}: Spawning Pool becomes a 1/1 black Skeleton creature with "{B}: Regenerate this creature" until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it regenerates, the next time it would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
mc.printedText:
Spawning Pool comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add one black mana to your mana pool.
{1}{B}: Spawning Pool becomes a 1/1 black creature with "{B}: Regenerate this creature" until end of turn. This creature still counts as a land.

mc.name: Ghitu Encampment
mc.oracleText:
Ghitu Encampment comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{1}{R}: Ghitu Encampment becomes a 2/1 red Warrior creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
mc.printedText:
Ghitu Encampment comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add one red mana to your mana pool.
{1}{R}: Ghitu Encampment becomes a 2/1 red creature with first strike until end of turn. This creature still counts as a land.

mc.name: Treetop Village
mc.oracleText:
Treetop Village comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player.)
mc.printedText:
Treetop Village comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add one green mana to your mana pool.
{1}{G}: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green creature with trample until end of turn. This creature still counts as a land.

mc.name: Ring of Gix
mc.oracleText:
Echo {3} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
{1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
{1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
mc.flavorText: Not every cage is made of bars.

mc.name: Damping Engine
mc.oracleText: A player who controls more permanents than any other can't play lands or artifact, creature, or enchantment spells. That player may sacrifice a permanent to ignore this effect until end of turn.
mc.printedText: A player who controls more permanents than any other cannot play lands or artifact, creature, or enchantment spells. That player may sacrifice a permanent to ignore this effect until end of turn.

mc.name: Beast of Burden
mc.oracleText: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures in play.
mc.printedText: Beast of Burden has power and toughness each equal to the total number of creatures in play.
mc.flavorText: "If it is meant to be nothing but a machine," Karn finally asked Jhoira, "why did Urza build it to be like me?"

mc.name: Crawlspace
mc.oracleText: No more than two creatures can attack you each combat.
mc.printedText: No more than two creatures can attack you each combat.
mc.flavorText: The goblins did not understand their attraction to the mana rig. They simply knew it was where they belonged.

mc.name: Palinchron
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Palinchron comes into play, untap up to seven lands.
{2}{U}{U}: Return Palinchron to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Palinchron comes into play, untap up to seven lands.
{2}{U}{U}: Return Palinchron to owner's hand.

mc.name: Phyrexian Denouncer
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Denouncer: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Denouncer: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The first stage of the illness: rash and nausea."
--Phyrexian progress notes

mc.name: Thran War Machine
mc.oracleText:
Echo {4} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
Thran War Machine attacks each turn if able.
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
Thran War Machine attacks each turn if able.

mc.name: Grim Monolith
mc.oracleText:
Grim Monolith doesn't untap during your untap step.

{T}: Add {3} to your mana pool.

{4}: Untap Grim Monolith.
mc.printedText:
Grim Monolith does not untap during your untap phase.
{T}: Add three colorless mana to your mana pool. Play this ability as a mana source.
{4}: Untap Grim Monolith.
mc.flavorText: Part prison, part home.

mc.name: Urza's Blueprints
mc.oracleText:
Echo {6} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
{T}: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
{T}: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: From concept to paper to reality.

mc.name: Goblin Medics
mc.oracleText: Whenever Goblin Medics becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Whenever Goblin Medics becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"First, do some harm."
--Oath of Goblins

mc.name: Thran Weaponry
mc.oracleText:
Echo {4} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
You may choose not to untap Thran Weaponry during your untap step.
{2}, {T}: All creatures get +2/+2 as long as Thran Weaponry remains tapped.
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
You may choose not to untap Thran Weaponry during your untap phase.
{2}, {T}: All creatures get +2/+2 as long as Thran Weaponry remains tapped.

mc.name: Ticking Gnomes
mc.oracleText:
Echo {3} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
Sacrifice Ticking Gnomes: Ticking Gnomes deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
Sacrifice Ticking Gnomes: Ticking Gnomes deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Yavimaya Granger
mc.oracleText:
Echo {2}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Yavimaya Granger comes into play, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
When Yavimaya Granger comes into play, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that land into play tapped. Shuffle your library afterward.

mc.name: Pyromancy
mc.oracleText: {3}, Discard a card at random: Pyromancy deals damage to target creature or player equal to the converted mana cost of the discarded card.
mc.printedText: {3}, Discard a card at random: Pyromancy deals to target creature or player damage equal to the total casting cost of the discarded card.
mc.flavorText:
Who harnesses fire controls the world.
--Ghitu proverb

mc.name: Repopulate
mc.oracleText:
Shuffle all creature cards from target player's graveyard into that player's library.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
mc.printedText:
Shuffle all creature cards from target player's graveyard into that player's library.
Cycling {2} (You may pay {2} and discard this card from your hand to draw a card. Play this ability as an instant.)

mc.name: Phyrexian Defiler
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Defiler: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Defiler: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The third stage of the illness: muscle aches and persistent cough."
--Phyrexian progress notes

mc.name: Phyrexian Debaser
mc.oracleText:
Flying

{T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Debaser: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Debaser: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The second stage of the illness: high fever and severe infectiousness."
--Phyrexian progress notes

mc.name: Devout Harpist
mc.oracleText: {T}: Destroy target Aura attached to a creature.
mc.printedText: {T}: Destroy target creature enchantment.
mc.flavorText: The notes themselves are irrelevant. The music's effect, however, is worth ten armies.

mc.name: Sustainer of the Realm
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Sustainer of the Realm blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Sustainer of the Realm blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The harder you push, the stronger we become."
--Radiant, to Urza

mc.name: Ghitu Fire-Eater
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Ghitu Fire-Eater: Ghitu Fire-Eater deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Ghitu Fire-Eater: Ghitu Fire-Eater deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"They are called --'Mi'uto,' which means --'one use.'"
--Jhoira, artificer

mc.name: Opportunity
mc.oracleText: Target player draws four cards.
mc.printedText: Target player draws four cards.
mc.flavorText:
"He cocooned himself alone in his workshop for months. When he finally emerged, all broad grins and excited chatter, I knew he'd found his answer."
--Barrin, master wizard

mc.name: Phyrexian Plaguelord
mc.oracleText:
{T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Plaguelord: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
{T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Plaguelord: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The final stage of the illness: delirium, convulsions, and death."
--Phyrexian progress notes

mc.name: Erase
mc.oracleText: Remove target enchantment from the game.
mc.printedText: Remove target enchantment from the game.
mc.flavorText: Perception is more pleasing than truth.

mc.name: Hope and Glory
mc.oracleText: Untap two target creatures. Each of them gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Untap two target creatures. Each of them gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Serra ruled by faith. I cannot afford that luxury."
--Radiant, archangel

mc.name: Aura Flux
mc.oracleText: All other enchantments have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this enchantment unless you pay {2}."
mc.printedText: Each other enchantment gains "During your upkeep, pay {2} or sacrifice this enchantment."
mc.flavorText: To some, the Tolarian sunrise was a blinding flash; to others, a lingering glow.

mc.name: Engineered Plague
mc.oracleText:
As Engineered Plague comes into play, choose a creature type.

All creatures of the chosen type get -1/-1.
mc.printedText:
When Engineered Plague comes into play, choose a creature type.
All creatures of the chosen type get -1/-1.
mc.flavorText:
"The admixture of bitterwort in the viral brew has produced most favorable results."
--Phyrexian progress notes

mc.name: Phyrexian Reclamation
mc.oracleText: {1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: {1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: Death is no excuse to stop working.

mc.name: Giant Cockroach
mc.flavorText: If the sun ever hit the swamp, where would these scurry to?

mc.name: Lava Axe
mc.oracleText: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText: "Catch"

mc.name: Viashino Bey
mc.oracleText: If Viashino Bey attacks, all creatures you control attack if able.
mc.printedText: When Viashino Bey attacks, all creatures you control attack if able.
mc.flavorText:
When the bey runs, match his stride.
--Viashino saying

mc.name: Silk Net
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +1/+1 and can block creatures with flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Sometimes it's possible to pull a meal out of thin air.

mc.name: Gang of Elk
mc.oracleText: Whenever Gang of Elk becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature blocks it, Gang of Elk gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The elk is Gaea's favorite, who wears the forest on its brow.

mc.name: Karmic Guide
mc.oracleText:
Flying, protection from black
Echo {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Karmic Guide comes into play, return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
mc.printedText:
Flying, protection from black; echo (During your next upkeep after this permanent comes under your control, pay its casting cost or sacrifice it.)
When Karmic Guide comes into play, choose target creature card in your graveyard and put that creature into play.

mc.name: Goblin Welder
mc.oracleText: {T}: Choose target artifact a player controls and target artifact card in that player's graveyard. If both targets are still legal as this ability resolves, that player sacrifices the artifact in play, then puts the other artifact from his or her graveyard into play.
mc.printedText: {T}: Exchange target artifact a player controls for target artifact card in that player's graveyard.
mc.flavorText: "I wrecked your metal guy, boss. But look I made you an ashtray."

mc.name: Burst of Energy
mc.oracleText: Untap target permanent.
mc.printedText: Untap target permanent.
mc.flavorText:
"I stand ready to die for our world. Who will stand with me?"
--Radiant, archangel

mc.name: Ghitu War Cry
mc.oracleText: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The war cry is not simply a shout but a sacrament.

mc.name: Last-Ditch Effort
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice any number of creatures. Last-Ditch Effort deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of creatures sacrificed this way.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice X creatures. Last-Ditch Effort deals X damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"If you're gonna lose, at least make sure they don't win as much."
--Jula, goblin raider
